content: swirling like patterns the wind makes in the sand this easy to memorise colourwork repeat has more effect over a full sock than the small chart makes you believe at first sight very addictive and quick to make these sock knit up in no time materials approx 60g of mc yarn sand approx 40 of cc yarn orange 2 5mm dpns or needles for magic loop or size required to get gauge 2mm dpns or needles for magic loop or size required to get gauge tapestry needle sizes 1 2 3 4 with a stitch count of 50 60 70 80 the foot circumference at the suggested gauge is 14cm 16 5cm 19 5cm 22cm length can easily adjusted in the stockinette part instructions are written for the construction and charted for the colourwork
